title: Cinematic Trailer and Intro Music Pack
description: Promote your projects, videos, games with fabulous tracks! Constantly building melodic, modern sounding trailer and intro music with action, classical and fantasy RPG style.
longDescription:
Constantly building melodic, modern sounding trailer and intro music with action, classical and fantasy style.

Perfect for teasers, trailers, heroic intros, historical projects, promotional videos, film scores, moving image sequences, or background music.

This pack contains different moods from calm melodic music to energetic soundtracks.


Main Instruments: Deep, huge drums, orchestral staccatos, big risers / hits, digital and orchestra brass sounds. Orchestral ensembles, epic orchestra risers and choirs. Flute, strings, soft piano, orchestral ensembles, epic orchestra risers and modern sounds.


Preview:

https://soundcloud.com/adamatysmusic/adamatys-cinematic-trailer-and-intro-music-pack-preview


If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to contact me!

adamatytales@gmail.com
